modName: Immersive Color - Dungeons and Interiors - All DLCs - Zero FPS Loss
summary: Improves the color balance of all dungeons and interiors.
descriptionHtml:
Immersive Color is an imagespace mod that improves every interior and dungeon in vanilla Skyrim and the three DLCs.

Dungeons and interiors are now darker with a richer, more accurate color balance. Check the images for comparison shots.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Requires: Dawngaurd, Hearthfires, and Dragonborn.
Keep this mod last in your load order if you want to see the changes.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I -strongly- recommend using this mod in conjunction with Enhanced Lights and FX by anamorfus:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/27043/?

(Please disable the ELFX "Enhancer" option)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Compatibility:

Running this mod with other Imagespace modifiers such as RCRN or ELFX "Enhancer" may give you unexpected color results. Use at your own discretion.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: tritonxiv
